question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email, and follow the instructions sent to your inbox.

question: What is the process to change my password?
answer: Go to Settings > Security > Change Password. Enter your current password and then your new password twice.

question: How can I update my email address?
answer: Navigate to Settings > Profile > Email. Enter your new email and verify it through the confirmation link.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, Amex), PayPal, and bank transfers for enterprise accounts.

question: How do I cancel my subscription?
answer: Go to Settings > Billing > Cancel Subscription. Your access will continue until the end of your billing period.

question: Can I get a refund?
answer: Refunds are available within 30 days of purchase. Contact support@example.com with your order number.

question: How do I export my data?
answer: Go to Settings > Data > Export. Choose your format (CSV, JSON, or PDF) and click 'Download'.

question: Is my data secure?
answer: Yes, we use AES-256 encryption for data at rest and TLS 1.3 for data in transit. We're SOC 2 Type II certified.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: Email support@example.com, use the chat widget in the bottom right, or call 1-800-SUPPORT (Mon-Fri, 9am-5pm EST).

question: What are your business hours?
answer: Our support team is available Monday through Friday, 9am to 5pm Eastern Time. Email support is monitored 24/7.

question: How do I delete my account?
answer: Go to Settings > Account > Delete Account. This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All your data will be deleted within 30 days.

question: Can I use the service on mobile devices?
answer: Yes, we have native iOS and Android apps. You can also access our service through any mobile web browser.

question: What browsers do you support?
answer: We support the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Internet Explorer is not supported.

question: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
answer: Go to Settings > Security > Two-Factor Authentication. Scan the QR code with your authenticator app and enter the verification code.

question: What happens if I exceed my usage limit?
answer: You'll receive an email notification at 80% and 100% usage. After exceeding, you can upgrade your plan or wait until next billing cycle.
